dishes.name: Roasted eggs
dishes.description: A Vietnamese classic! Fragrant broth filled with rice noodles, chicken, herbs, and spices.

dishes.description: Fresh fish stuffed with herbs, spices, and breadcrumbs, baked to perfection.

dishes.description: Fluffy rice mixed with succulent shrimp, herbs, and spices.

dishes.description: Tagliatelle noodles tossed with succulent shrimp, garlic, and cherry tomatoes.

dishes.name: Pumpkin Soup
dishes.description: Creamy pumpkin soup with a hint of nutmeg and cinnamon, perfect for a cozy night in.

dishes.name: Baked vegetables
dishes.description: Healthy and delicious! Steamed with herbs, ginger, and soy sauce.
